stable.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
stable.bodyMarkdown:
### ‚ú® New Features
- [`58eca90`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/58eca906bf72e77a008041b086744fd50fbc61cb) - **settings/about**: add build information *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`09faf62`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/09faf626a6e1cf35d9cd0886f6d8aa0542be841a) - **shizuku**: suggest restarting when waiting for too long *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`0416882`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0416882aa6912877ad4282df6e5983bca0417593) - **shizuku**: add support for Sui *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`d635bf0`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/d635bf07ef2d42aa497229b79d622283a97de4cb) - **maps**: full screen thumbnail viewer *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`9fd1972`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/9fd1972015a429691614059e75db80c692a6829d) - **maps/list**: grid style & remember sorting option *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`872f50e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/872f50eb68dfc6766dcb05abdca6414300f72df6) - **l10n**: update translations *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`482cc08`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/482cc0839d42821a4efaa89a6594fcb87c3fcd44) - **update-sheet**: version name fading edge color *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`ec60761`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ec60761e6ca5caef31e4d6866f4c201bedafcaa7) - do not crash when different DocumentsUI package used *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`b186816`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/b1868166e5eca14a24fcc06a6543d1c3b0d0d6ca) - **settings/storage**: folder picker on raw path inputs *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`e6ccaaa`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/e6ccaaa1cacc4e595671e1c6e5c3b0b73515c419) - **updates**: do not show toast on config change *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`387778e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/387778e939bdb56216b9cc5390702bd4cb7e2e51) - **settings/libraries**: correct padding *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`2bfd27d`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/2bfd27da1929b315b931b66270a9d91180730552) - correct restricted version for `com.android.documentsui` *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### ‚ôªÔ∏è Refactors
- [`c2aa90a`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c2aa90ae74d61a94a34fbd459fbc8af97e93b0ae) - preference manager *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`0d91efa`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0d91efa85841cbb5f45ae5d08734e8c6eecb8379) - file handling *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

preRelease.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
